solution_line_template: He used to make {old_hourly}*{old_hours_per_week}=$<<{old_hourly}*{old_hours_per_week}={old_weekly}>>{old_weekly} per week
So his raise was {new_weekly}-{old_weekly}=$<<{new_weekly}-{old_weekly}={weekly_raise}>>{weekly_raise} per week
So he makes {weekly_raise}*{weeks_per_year}=$<<{weekly_raise}*{weeks_per_year}={yearly_raise}>>{yearly_raise} per year more
